Barry Boayes

· Los Angeles, CA · (657) 246-9483 · bboayes@gmail.com

Hi, I'm Barry. I'm a software engineer with a bachelor's degree in Computer Science from California State University, Los Angeles. Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy spending time with my family, traveling with my fiance, and cooking. When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I like to play video games, I am cooking up something on my instant pot, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the web development world.My site contains past projects and contact information. Feel free to send me a message if you have any question or have any concerns. I will get back at you as soon as a possible. Thank you. Enjoy!
